/usr/bin/f95  -Wl,--enable-new-dtags -pthread  CMakeFiles/MPI_derivedType.dir/derived_type.f90.o  -o MPI_derivedType  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_usempif08.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_usempi_ignore_tkr.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_mpifh.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so
